description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Borneo Beachfront Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Three Golf Rounds & Return Airport Transfers
hotels.description: Retreat to this tropical waterfront haven nestled along the sparkling South China Sea in Borneo's Kota Kinabalu. Part of the Sutera Harbour Resort complex, The Magellan Sutera is set across 384 acres of lush greenery, where lagoon-style pools and a dazzling array of restaurants and bars promise barefoot sophistication and true Sabahan hospitality. Spend sun-drenched afternoons relaxing by the beach or sipping cocktails by one of four mirage-like pools. Tee off at the Sutera Harbour Golf & Country Club, home to a 27-hole Graham Marsh-designed championship course offering unforgettable golf by the coast. Located just around the corner from Kota Kinabalu city centre, The Magellan Sutera Resort allows you to experience the best of Borneo's Sabah region. Whether you're looking for unforgettable cultural experiences or complete relaxation, the seaside sophistication of this high-end resort will fulfil your every need.

hotels.title: Malaysia Kota Kinabalu Hyatt Escape with Infinity Pool & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Kota Kinabalu with this five-star Hyatt stay. Just a short stroll from the lively Gaya Street and the scenic waterfront promenade, this contemporary hideaway is the perfect base for exploring Sabah’s rich culture and natural beauty. After a day of adventure, unwind with locally inspired cuisine at ON22 Restaurant, where fresh, regional ingredients take centre stage in flavourful Asian dishes. Then, ascend to ON23 Sky Bar for delicious cocktails and gourmet nibbles, set against a backdrop of lush hills and ocean sunsets.

hotels.title: Five-Star Malaysia Borneo Oceanfront Paradise with Overwater Villas
hotels.description: Let the sounds of waves crashing lull you into a state of holiday dreaming at Gayana Marine Resort, a five-star hideaway resting on the crescent shores of Malohom Bay off the coast of Sabah. Spend days dining at Macac Restaurant, boasting exceptional ocean views, or enjoy a tropical cocktail at Latitude Bar at sunset. When you're in need of some RnR, book a pampering treatment at Echo Wellness Spa, a tranquil space perched at the ocean's edge.

hotels.title: Borneo Five-Star Beachfront Retreat with Four Dazzling Swimming Pools
hotels.description: Escape to The Magellan Sutera Resort, a luxurious beachfront gem nestled beside the sparkling waters of the South China Sea. Part of the Sutera Harbour Resort complex, this tropical escape sits on 384 acres of lush greenery punctuated by lagoon-style pools, elegant accommodation, a huge array of restaurants and bars, and a stunning golf course. From the architectural majesty of the longhouse-style lobby to the impressive views of the sea, the resort offers leisure and adventure in one gorgeous location. Take part in energetic activities onsite including bowling, squash or table tennis, or spend the day relaxing on the beach and sipping cocktails by one of the resort's four pools. A trip to Sutera Harbour Marina, Golf and Country Club is a must, if only to see the 27-hole Graham Marsh-designed championship golf course. Whether you're looking for unforgettable experiences or complete relaxation, the barefoot sophistication of this high-end resort will fulfil your every need.

hotels.title: Borneo Beachfront Paradise with Championship Golf Course, Spa & 10 Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Escape to a five-star sanctuary on Malaysia’s tropical Borneo coast at Shangri-La Rasa Ria, Kota Kinabalu - a beachfront retreat nestled within 400 acres of lush rainforest. This expansive oasis offers the ultimate blend of adventure and tranquillity, with a pristine three-kilometre stretch of private beach, an 18-hole championship golf course and a serene spa tucked into the jungle canopy. Start your days dipping in the sparkling pool, taking a sunrise hike through the resort’s 64-acre nature reserve, or on a relaxing horse ride. Come evening, enjoy refreshing cocktails or retreat to your spacious room. Savour Chinese culinary delights at The Eighth, feast flavour-packed South East Asian food at Tepi Laut, or experience theatrical dining at Kozan Teppan-yaki. Whether you’re craving relaxation or adventure, this tropical paradise delivers an unforgettable escape.

hotels.vendor_name: Shangri-La's Tanjung Aru Resort and Spa
hotels.title: Borneo Waterfront Shangri-La Resort with Private Island Sunset Bar
hotels.description: Dreams of a secluded paradise are realised at Shangri-La Tanjung Aru, Kota Kinabalu, a five-star tropical oasis on the coast of Borneo. Lose yourself in fabulous facilities, including six bars and restaurants - one of which, Sunset Bar, is nestled on a private island out at sea, and is the best spot in Borneo for epic sunsets and cocktails. Head to the indulgent Chi, The Spa for pampering treatments or make use of the palm-fringed swimming pool and state-of-the-art fitness centre. Little ones are kept entertained with a fun-filled Kids' Club and water play area. For more splashy fun, head out to the resort's exclusively owned and operated STAR Marina, home to watersport services and a dive learning centre. This is also your gateway to the neighbouring islands: enjoy a day trip by boat to explore islands of soft white sand and azure waters.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Borneo Escape in Kota Kinabalu with Rooftop Restaurant & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Revel in the laidback coastal charms of Borneo's Kota Kinabalu from this elegant retreat, perfectly positioned in the heart of Sabah's capital. The sleek hotel serves up stunning views of the South China Sea and is a short stroll from the bustling Gaya Street Market, featuring a fascinating display of local produce, crafts, souvenirs and delicious tidbits. Savour international flavours at the hotel's Maupassant restaurant, grab a cuppa from the trendy Phileas Cafe and sip on well-crafted cocktails by the rooftop infinity pool. For a taste of local culture, the Sabah State Museum and the waterfront Kota Kinabalu City Mosque await exploration.
